hocmodbuilders Package

hocmodbuilders Package

mmwriter_alphabeta Module

class NEURONChlWriterAlphaBeta[source]

Bases: object

Units = {'gBar': 'S/cm2', 'e_rev': 'mV', 'gScale': ''}
classmethod build_hoc_section(cell, section, hocfile_obj, mta)[source]
classmethod build_mod(alphabeta_chl, modfile_set)[source]
chlHoc = '\n\n$(cell_name).internalsections [$section_index] {\n // AlphaBeta Channels\n insert $neuron_suffix\n #for variable_name, variable_value_nounit, variable_value_with_unit, variable_unit in $variables:\n $(variable_name)_$(neuron_suffix) = $variable_value_nounit //(in $variable_unit, converted from $variable_value_with_unit)\n #end for\n}\n'
